p: The infected class in our model represents the number of dogs with non-zero viral loads, rather than those exhibiting clinical symptoms. Thus, we avoid including latent or asymptomatic classes in our model. We set γ = 1/7 because viral shedding continues for approximately seven days after inoculation [16]. Seroconversion for dogs infected with CIV also happens at approximately 7 days [16]. Equilibrium seroprevalence is then given by R/N (see Supporting Information, Text S1, Section 1.7).
